message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. I believe this is a good starting point for a fair negotiation.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a 60/40 split to account for the time value of money. Let's make a deal and avoid further losses.
I understand your desire for a fairer split, but 60/40 is still too far in your favor.  I propose a 70/30 split as a compromise. Let's move towards an agreement.
Alice, we're running out of time and losing money with every round. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly.  Let's be rational and take the win-win.
